body.p:
Sir Gen Huston Has said Every thing in relation to my circumstance I wold come and se you but my Circumstance will not allow me to I hope you will Releive me of those fines they went against me at the last circut court of franklin I hav quit Playing Cards and gon to hard work hoping
this will Recive your kindness

I remain very
Respectfuly
H. C. Metcalf

P S
I was fined in 2 cases for Dealing faro Please hav the Remits sent to Lexington as the Judg ments have ben sent hear
